channel.title: RuneThrive - Classic 317 Server w/ Edits + Bluurs Client
channel.description:
I was looking through my computer, as I found some old RSPS files. Which was pro, because I could release this and continue other people's paths to their server.
If you search up keyword "Runethrive", you'll see that the same person called Beastly released this. I am that person.
Just click the MSN butterfly on the post next to Beastly's name and it will lead you here:
[img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/7904/proofhs.png[/img]
As you can see, it says Sign OUT. There's your proof.
3 Cheers for Legalness.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Approximately, July 30th 2009, EST Time, 5:43:36 PM.
My server could no longer stay online. I tried my hardest to keep it up. Now, at that time, I was not an expert coder as I am now. I was very angry with myself. All that work, put down, because my computer decided not to host itself. I had failed my players.
But, I thought of another idea.
I decided to release this project, to players, and for all those all around RSPS Communities, to start their own RSPS, leeching or not.
I had quit my own server. To start others.
I will now provide information starting from August 02, 2009, from which I had posted this on Mopar.
First, I will announce the credits.
[b].:Credits:.[/b] JaydenD12 for providing Ddsspeced v2 as the base. Tiger/Beastly/Deviant aka me altogether for editting it, mainly. Aeolian's 508 HD Cache for 317 from Mopar. Bluur for providing the base of the client.
I had my server on for a while, and about 6 or 7 players complained that you needed RUNES for teleports. They also complained that it was like Runescape. THAT WAS MY GOAL, AND FOR IT TO PROVIDE A CHANCE FOR PLAYERS TO BE WHAT THEY WANT TO BE IN RS.
[b].:What I Changed:.[/b] Added ::Home* ::Fally ::Ardougne ::Cammy ::Varrock ::Event (was for my upcoming birthday) You can change these. *If you use this command, all NPCs at lumbridge will disappear, so you have to go to home through the spellbook.
Moved Staffzone. Isn't glitched and no longer glitched.
Added a Rares Shop for Staffzone.
Added monsters in staffzone.
Added Jad in staffzone as well.
Moved all Shop Npcs to home (I think). Might be more around Fally.
Changed Starter.
Made some Npcs Stationary.
Pkbox (I couldn't add the Wildy Zone with it...I wasn't an expert coder at the time, command is :: pkbox, and ignore that space).
Added a Public Boolean nonWild (I tried to make a Pkbox in wildy)
Editted some commands.
::Staffring (Dragonstone ring is no longer the Admin Ring, Onyx Ring is, with the same bonuses, 5k+ you can edit this though).
[b].:What I did not Change:.[/b] Starter Place (You start at tutorial island, and talk to the Ddsspeced Guide...Will change name in v2, but right now, only in dialogue)
Training
Monsters Scattered Around
Some Commands
Home Area (As in Lumbridge)
--------------------------------
You will need winrar to extract the files.
Download Winrar [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]here[/url].
Download the Source [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=URR4Z34T]here[/url]. *The source is 681 KB!!!*
Download the Client .[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=I0ZVS8EL]here[/url].
There are no viruses, I assure you. Winrar is from the official site, and Megaupload does not allow viruses. If you don't trust me, I will post a virus scan within the next hour and 30 minutes.
Btw, there is an anti-leech in the client.java, you have to see which it is; in the client, or in the source. All I'm saying is, the error is a method.
Pictures, and very few of them btw. Just showing off the basic things.
[img]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc339/ownedlol_2008/1.png[/img]
[img]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc339/ownedlol_2008/2.png[/img]
[img]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc339/ownedlol_2008/3.png[/img]
You'll have to download it to see what's there.
Feel free to post questions or so, and I will answer them ASAP. Feel free to also email me questions at Rspsevolution@live.com.
[b]I won't tolerate flame, if there is atleast some flame, I will remove this post. I want positive comments on how I can improve if this release is bad.[/b][/center]

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:12, topic:333239”]“I know this is JaydenD12’s Ddsspeced, but this is my version of it. If you leech off of my version, I will report to the
administrator, and action will be taken immediately.”

ahhahaha oh wow boy. … ahahahahahahahahahahahaha my god. and dude the ddsspeced guide part? its client sided dip shit.[/quote]

Sounds like a 10 year old boy was let back on the computer. +1 If you agree.

item.title: RuneThrive - Classic 317 Server w/ Edits + Bluurs Client
item.dc:creator: @_Deviant `Deviant
item.description:
@_Deviant wrote:

I was looking through my computer, as I found some old RSPS files. Which was pro, because I could release this and continue other people’s paths to their server.

If you search up keyword “Runethrive”, you’ll see that the same person called Beastly released this. I am that person.

Just click the MSN butterfly on the post next to Beastly’s name and it will lead you here:

As you can see, it says Sign OUT. There’s your proof.

3 Cheers for Legalness.

Approximately, July 30th 2009, EST Time, 5:43:36 PM.

My server could no longer stay online. I tried my hardest to keep it up. Now, at that time, I was not an expert coder as I am now. I was very angry with myself. All that work, put down, because my computer decided not to host itself. I had failed my players.

But, I thought of another idea.

I decided to release this project, to players, and for all those all around RSPS Communities, to start their own RSPS, leeching or not.

I had quit my own server. To start others.

I will now provide information starting from August 02, 2009, from which I had posted this on Mopar.

First, I will announce the credits.

.:Credits:.
JaydenD12 for providing Ddsspeced v2 as the base.
Tiger/Beastly/Deviant aka me altogether for editting it, mainly.
Aeolian’s 508 HD Cache for 317 from Mopar.
Bluur for providing the base of the client.

I had my server on for a while, and about 6 or 7 players complained that you needed RUNES for teleports. They also complained that it was like Runescape. THAT WAS MY GOAL, AND FOR IT TO PROVIDE A CHANCE FOR PLAYERS TO BE WHAT THEY WANT TO BE IN RS.

.:What I Changed:.
Added ::Home* ::Fally ::Ardougne ::Cammy ::Varrock ::Event (was for my upcoming birthday) You can change these.
*If you use this command, all NPCs at lumbridge will disappear, so you have to go to home through the spellbook.

Moved Staffzone. Isn’t glitched and no longer glitched.

Added a Rares Shop for Staffzone.

Added monsters in staffzone.

Added Jad in staffzone as well.

Moved all Shop Npcs to home (I think). Might be more around Fally.

Changed Starter.

Made some Npcs Stationary.

Pkbox (I couldn’t add the Wildy Zone with it…I wasn’t an expert coder at the time, command is :: pkbox, and ignore that space).

Added a Public Boolean nonWild (I tried to make a Pkbox in wildy)

Editted some commands.

::Staffring (Dragonstone ring is no longer the Admin Ring, Onyx Ring is, with the same bonuses, 5k+ you can edit this though).

.:What I did not Change:.
Starter Place (You start at tutorial island, and talk to the Ddsspeced Guide…Will change name in v2, but right now, only in dialogue)

Training

Monsters Scattered Around

Some Commands

Home Area (As in Lumbridge)

You will need winrar to extract the files.

Download Winrar here.

Download the Source here. The source is 681 KB!!!

Download the Client .here.

There are no viruses, I assure you. Winrar is from the official site, and Megaupload does not allow viruses. If you don’t trust me, I will post a virus scan within the next hour and 30 minutes.

Btw, there is an anti-leech in the client.java, you have to see which it is; in the client, or in the source. All I’m saying is, the error is a method.

Pictures, and very few of them btw. Just showing off the basic things.

1.png766×527

2.png768×532

3.png767×530

You’ll have to download it to see what’s there.

Feel free to post questions or so, and I will answer them ASAP. Feel free to also email me questions at Rspsevolution@live.com.

I won’t tolerate flame, if there is atleast some flame, I will remove this post. I want positive comments on how I can improve if this release is bad.[/center]
